## Why teach visualization?
## How to teach visualization

Learning to create effective data visualizations requires a variety of related skills - data analysis, graphic design, visual communication, perhaps even computer programming. Visualization has grown into a field of study of its own right, building increasingly strong empirical evidence of the processes by which individuals process and interpret data visualizations. 


### Basic design tips (conceptual introduction)
- Focus on basic charts and graphs
- Optional: Tie to a tool students are already using
- Try to find collaborators/colleagues to present a different view
